reviews.review_text: Have only begun to read this little book. Little meaning it is about the size of a childs board book. This disappointed me. I was expecting a novel. Considered returning it even. But if you want a hot "little" read about the exploits of the character, this will do it for you. Reads like the fantasy section of Penthouse. Not sure if it's really worth $18.95 Canadian but it's paid for now so what the heck.You decide.

title: Lie With Me
word_cloud: begin little little mean size child board disappoint expect consider return even want hot little exploit character fantasy section not sure really worth pay decide
summary:
In this small format erotic Orlando, an unnamed woman narrates her life of lust while unnamed men describe their erotic encounters with her from their perspectives. 

Like Teiresias, the blind seer who has been both man and woman, we experience both sides of this dizzying story - a rhapsodic examination of love, degradation, hatred and desire, as well as a parody of the pornographic imagination that informs it. 

Part Jean Genet, part Molly Bloom, part Penthouse Forum, Lie With Me is a disturbing, arousing love story - and the work of an original, uncompromising talent.
story_arc: The story gets better over time
